survey_name: Gen Z Digital Banking Experience Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand the preferences and satisfaction levels of Gen Z users with digital banking services, focusing on usability, features, and trust.

questions.question_text: Which digital banking app do you primarily use?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option to capture less common choices. Ensure the list is mobile-friendly.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with an optional text input for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which digital banking app do you primarily use?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your primary digital banking app?
questions.client_notes: Use a standard 5-point Likert scale for consistency.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with radio buttons.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your primary digital banking app?

questions.question_text: Which of the following features do you use most frequently in your digital banking app? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture feature popularity.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with checkboxes and an optional text input for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which of the following features do you use most frequently in your digital banking app? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What is the most important factor when choosing a digital banking app?
answer_options: User interface and ease of use
questions.client_notes: This helps prioritize features for app development.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with radio buttons and an optional text input for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What is the most important factor when choosing a digital banking app?
answer_options: User interface and ease of use

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your digital banking app to a friend or colleague? (Scale of 0-10)
questions.client_notes: Standard Net Promoter Score (NPS) question for benchmarking.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with a 0-10 scale.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your digital banking app to a friend or colleague? (Scale of 0-10)

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in your digital banking app?

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in your digital banking app?
